ing: 1 seedless watermelon, rind removed and watermelon cut into chunks
16 fluid ounces peach-flavored iced tea (such as POMÂ® Pomegranate Peach Passion White Tea)
n: Agua Fresca with Watermelon and POMÂ® Tea
des: "A traditional watermelon agua fresca blended with POMÂ® pomegranate peach passion white tea. Absolutely perfect on a summer day. Serve over ice and garnish with a mint sprig or peach slice."
ins: Blend watermelon in a blender until smooth; add lime juice and blend well. Add peach-flavored iced tea; blend until combined. Dilute with water to desired strength.
